meanings.definition: A space that can be occupied or where something can be done.
meanings.sent1: The small room was filled with toys.
meanings.sent2: Please keep your room clean and tidy.
meanings.sent3: The room seemed to shrink every time more people entered.
meanings.sent4: Her heart had no room for hatred, only love.
meanings.sent5: The room echoed with laughter and joy.

meanings.definition: An area within a building enclosed by walls.
meanings.sent1: The hotel room had a beautiful view of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We gathered in the living room to watch a movie.
meanings.sent3: The room suddenly felt too small for the giant birthday cake.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a room full of memories, some happy and some sad.
meanings.sent5: The room smelled of fresh paint and new beginnings.
